sentences.sContent: His ship was blown up by a torpedo.
sentences.sCn: 他的船被一枚鱼雷炸毁了。

sentences.sContent: Sometimes, when you go into small rooms, you can find very interesting things, like this torpedo.
sentences.sCn: 有时候，你走进一些小房间里，你会发现非常有趣的东西，就像这个鱼雷。

synos.tran: 鱼雷；[军]水雷；油井爆破筒；电鳐；职业杀手

trans.tranOther: a long narrow weapon that is fired under the surface of the sea and explodes when it hits something
